dcterms:creator: Z. Luo
F. Branchaud-Charron
C. Lemaire
J. Konrad
S. Li
A. Mishra

J. Eichel
P.-M. Jodoin
dcterms:description: The MIO-TCD dataset is the largest public benchmark for object detection in traffic surveillance images, containing 110,000 images for training and 27,743 images for testing. It includes a public object detection challenge for localization.
dcterms:title: MIOvision Traffic Camera Dataset (MIO-TCD)

dcterms:creator: K. Behrendt
L. Novak
R. Botros
dcterms:description: The Bosch Small Traffic Lights dataset presents a challenge for detecting small objects with partial occlusions, containing 5,093 training images and 8,334 testing images.
dcterms:title: Bosch Small Traffic Lights Dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
C. Stiller
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI object detection dataset includes 7,481 training images and 7,518 testing images, focusing on various object categories, particularly cars, in real-world driving scenarios.
dcterms:title: KITTI Object Detection
